extendedInfo.description: The No.1 free app in iPhone App Store all over the world has finally landed onto Android Market! Over 10 million iPhone users have played this game! What are you waiting for? This is the the ONE and ONLY original âdrag toilet paperâ game. We bring you the best time killer game!Have you ever had the impulse to drag the whole roll of toilet paper at one go?Now you can realize your evil idea just in iDragPaper!Features:- 3D toilet paper- Addictive gameplay- iTheme which let you change the paper pattern- Share your score through Facebook & Twitter- Social platform provided by Papaya- With a smart widget which can track your score Playersâ Reviews:"This is the best game in history. I could not have liked a better game than this one.""An amazing game that is so simple but fun. A must buy that is great to play with your family""It is a Perfect idiot's game.""This is a stupid pointless game."Someone likes it while someone doesnât. To make your choice, download and play!Tap âPlayâ to start the game.Swipe the screen to drag the toilet paper.Drag the paper as fast as you can and possibly you are in the top of the world.Take the challenge now and have fun!Tips: Because of the diverse models of touch screen, you may encounter different gameplay than it on the iPhone. Find the best play way for your device, like on Google Nexus S playing with two thumbs will get a better time.

reviews.title: Best app
reviews.comment: Really really good app when i first played it my high score is 00\'03\'\'00 its the best score than anyone elses its the highest this app is amazing please make more iphone apps for the samsung galixcy ace and if you can can you make the game whats on iphone but put it on the market so it can work on my samsung galixcy ace the game is called gangstar miami vindication thanks if ya can make it for my phone model and make it free thank you best app ever.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 00:02:69 is my fastest
reviews.comment: This app is very addictive and my top 10 ranks are covered by less than 00:00:40  Only downside to the game is the fact its only 1 level, there should be varying sizes off loo rolls an you should be able to see all idrag scores from all players in one big leader board.  Still an awesome game, one I would suggest to other I users or droid users.  Kieran
reviews.author: kieran aver
